mapper.select:
select * from t_user a where 1=1
and lower(a.loginName) like lower('%${loginName}%')
and lower(a.name) like lower('%${name}%')

select count(a.id) from t_user a where 1=1
and lower(a.loginName) like lower('%${loginName}%')
and lower(a.name) like lower('%${name}%')
select * from t_user a where lower(a.loginName)=lower(#{loginName})
select c.url from t_role_user a,t_role_menu b,t_menu c where a.role_id=b.role_id and b.menu_id=c.id and c.url is not null and a.user_id=#{user_id}
select b.* from t_position_org_user a,t_org b where a.org_orgno=b.orgno and a.user_id=#{user_id}
select count(1) from t_position_org_user a,t_position_org_access b where a.position_id=b.position_id and a.user_id=#{user_id} and b.org_id=#{store_id} and b.edit=1
select a.* from t_role a ,t_role_user b where a.id=b.role_id and b.user_id=#{user_id}
select b.* from t_position_org_user a,t_position b where a.position_id=b.id and a.user_id=#{user_id}

select max(a.look) look,max(a.edit) edit,b.id as org_id,b.code as org_code,b.name as org_name from T_POSITION_ORG_ACCESS a inner join t_position_org_user c on a.position_id=c.position_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} right join T_ORG b on a.org_id=b.id
where b.ORGTYPE in ('store_build','store_prepare') group by b.id,b.code,b.name

select max(a.look) look,max(a.edit) edit,b.id as org_id,b.code as org_code,b.name as org_name from T_POSITION_ORG_ACCESS a inner join t_position_org_user c on a.position_id=c.position_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} right join T_ORG b on a.org_id=b.id
where b.ORGTYPE='workunit' group by b.id,b.code,b.name

select max(a.look) look,max(a.edit) edit,b.id as org_id,b.code as org_code,b.name as org_name from T_POSITION_ORG_ACCESS a inner join t_position_org_user c on a.position_id=c.position_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} right join T_ORG b on a.org_id=b.id where b.ORGTYPE='repair_centre' group by b.id,b.code,b.name
